newsitem.title: UK: Lloyd Thompson unveils profit expectations.
newsitem.headline: Lloyd Thompson unveils profit expectations.

text.p: British insurance broker Lloyd Thompson said on Tuesday that it expected that pre-tax profits for the six months to December 31 would be not less than 10.4 million stg.
The estimate was made in documents relating to the 300 million stg proposed agreed merger between the group and JIB Group.
JIB said it estimated that pre-tax profits for the year to December would amount to not less than 27 million stg.
The estimates are based on unaudited management accounts to November 30 and management estimates and forecasts for the remainder of the year.
Costs related to the merger, which will be treated as exceptional items, have not been taken into account in the profit estimates.
